00038 void RequestHandlerUpdate::run() {
00039   ResponseCallbackUpdate cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00040   TableIdentifier table;
00041   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->messageLen - 2;
00042   uint8_t *msgPtr = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00043   StaticBuffer mods;
00044 
00045   // Table
00046   if (!table.decode(&msgPtr, &remaining))
00047     goto abort;
00048 
00049   mods.base = msgPtr;
00050   mods.size = remaining;
00051   mods.own = false;
00052 
00053   m_range_server->update(&cb, &table, mods);
00054 
00055   return;
00056 
00057  abort:
00058   HT_ERROR("Encoding problem with Update message");
00059   cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Encoding problem with Update message");
00060   return;
00061 }
